Nighlight::

Nighlight looked horrified that Ender opened fire against Rodimus she 
took her weapon and open fire against Ender.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Ender::
>        Ender caught the second optic blast in the chest flipping 
him 
> backwards.  He landed on his feet and stumbled back a step.  "Now 
that wasn't 
> very nice."  His eyes gleamed, almost demonically with a psychotic 
rage.  
> "KEEHEEHEE!"  He launched himself into the air transforming mid-
flight and 
> coming down behind Rodimus Prime.  Turning around to face Rodimus 
Prime.  
> "So, Rody, you ready to feel my wrath, eh?"  He grinned and fired a 
two quick 
> shots at his back.
